name: blobscriptions
description: Ethscriptions ESIP-8 implementation in JavaScript/TypeScript, also called Blobscriptions which is using Ethereum Blob Transactions to create Ethscriptions. The package includes a CLI to create and manage blobscriptions, as well as a library to track/index blobscriptions and BLOB-20 tokens. It is built with plugins architecture for easier development.
author: tunnckoCore
